title: Opulent Tropical Indonesian Resort with Three Onsite Restaurants
description: Escape to a luxurious tropical paradise with Holiday Inn Cikarang Jababeka, an IHG Hotel. Spend your days lounging by the oasis-like pool surrounded by lush greenery, or allow yourself to completely rejuvenate in the tranquil Orchidea Spa with a massage or aromatherapy foot bath. There are onsite dining options aplenty to tempt your tastebuds, including authentic Japanese flavours at Ikkyu, international and local plates at Delizio, and refreshing cocktails at the Saveur Wine Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Cikarang Jababeka, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jalan Jababeka Raya Kav. A-2, Cikarang 17530, West Java, Indonesia
